title: Group portrait of three men and three women standing, including groom, in center wearing moustache, dark bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, and smiling bride wearing headpiece with veil, two strand necklace, and light colored long sleeved wedding dress with flame patterned applique on yoke and skirt, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with striped floral wallpaper, window with floral lace curtains, and photographic portraits on right, possibly in Washington, Pennsylvania
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
